p: PCA and HCA analyses were performed for all obtained data (GC-MS and FTIR). For chemometrics, HCA and PCA were performed using the software OPUS Version 7.2 (Bruker, Germany) for FTIR data of Salvia species. Similarly, HCA and PCA multivariate analyses were performed by SIMCA 15 (Umetrics, Umea, Sweden) for GC-MS data of Salvia species.
